int cparser_match ( const cparser_t *  parser,
const char *  token,
const int  token_len,
cparser_node_t *  parent,
cparser_node_t **  match,
int *  is_complete 
)

Walk through all children of a node.

Return a match node if one is found.

Parameters:
parser Pointer to the parser structure.
token Pointer to the beginning of the token.
token_len Length of the token.
parent Pointer to the parent node.
Return values:
match Pointer to a node that matches the token. If there are multiple matches, the highest priority match is returned.
is_complete 1 if the token completely matches
Returns:
Number of matches.
